data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shokoohi, Ebrahim, Iranpour, Fahime, Peneva, Vlada, Elshishka, Milka, Fourie, Hendrika, Swart, Antoinette (2018): Ditylenchus sarvarae sp. n. (Tylenchina: Anguinidae) from Iran. Zootaxa 4399 (2): 197-206, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4399.2.4|3 occurrences
